issue.title: Add changelog output options [Prepend, Override, Append, Skip]

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

issue.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Yes, the problem is that the release notes won't be updated if there's already something in it.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
There could be an option in the configuration to either override, prepend or append the changelog (or don't show it at all), if there's already text in the release notes.

In my case I would like to override the notes, as another action writes a changelog to it, but I would like to use the changelog made by goreleaser.

issue.title: feat: allow to customize release notes update behavior

labels.name: size/L
labels.description: Denotes a PR that changes 100-499 lines, ignoring generated files.
